title: Lloyds share sales have now raised £15.5 billion for the taxpayer (HMT - UK Her ...
text: ( Source : HMT - UK Her Majesty's Treasury ) The government has sold a further 1% shareholding in Lloyds Banking Group through the trading plan launched in December, taking the total raised for the taxpayer to £ 15.5 billion and reducing the
